column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I am a pizza snob and usually seek out the Neapolitan style pizzas.  My wife and I were staying in downtown Chicago for a trade convention and didn't want to pass up the opportunity to experience deep dish pizza in the town that is known for it.  After much research
column2: we decided on Lou Malnati's.  There are several locations and we choose the one closest to our hotel.  We had to wait 5 minutes for a table and the place was packed.  A larger group would probably have a longer wait at dinner time.
